programme.title: Drift : Championnat de France
programme.desc: The French Drift Championship is one of the most important national championships in the European drift sport and attracts the interest of around 300 pilots every year. However, only the 32 best drivers can compete in the main event. To survive in the 1-on-1-battles, they must impress the judges with speed, precision and spectacular drift maneuvers.

programme.title: e-Trophée Andros
programme.desc: The Andros Trophy is the French national ice racing championship. The idea appeared long time ago in 1985 when professional racer Max Mamers and the owner of the Andros company, Frédéric Gervoson, met as rugby fans. They spent the winter racing with friends on ice circuits. In 2003 the trophy gained an international aspect with a race at Sherbrooke in Canada. In 2020, the racing series is repositioning itself as an electric racing series.

programme.title: Hi-Tec Drift Allstars Series Australia
programme.desc: The latest drifting competition on Motorvision.TV brings you the best drifters from Australia. Join us for thrilling duels, smoking wheels and non-stop drift battles for the Drift All Stars Series title.

programme.title: National Legend Cars
programme.desc: The Legends Cars National Championship brings back racing from yesteryear. The series features 5/8 scale replicas of pre-war 1930s Fords, Chevys and Dodges that are equipped with 125bhp-motorcycle engines. These cars are well known for delivering high-octane battles on race tracks around Great Britain.

programme.title: G Series Andorra
programme.desc: The Andorra-Pas de la Casa Circuit offers an excellent quality on the ice surface thanks to their geographical location. A thousand meters long and ten wide route that combines a wide straight line with curves of all kinds, completely covered with ice and snow.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Drift, fly & fire) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Drift, fly & fire»The Stunt Heroes from the German company â?oeAction Conceptâ? really let it rip. In the past they produced several award-winning stunts, but are always on the hunt for new spectacular scenes. This time stuntman Paul slides under an exploding vehicle. At the same time gangster bride Anna flies through the air.

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: More than 10 years ago the 1,000 hp Bugatti Veyron started a new era of super sports cars. By now almost all renowned manufacturers offer their own supercar. Frequently, today's strongest and fastest cars rely on hybrid technology or even drive in pure electric mode. Supercars takes a look at the sports car of the future and gives an insight into the latest technology and driving systems of the future.

programme.title: Classic Ride S1
programme.desc: Once a year Russian vintage fans meet at a spots stadium in Moscow Sports for the Retro Style, a vintage rally through Moscow. Classic Ride takes advantage of the opportunity to celebrate the passion for old cars with Russan drivers. Once ahead of its time, the Citroen SM is now a rare collector's item. Classic Rides takes a look at the French diva with an Italian heart.

programme.title: Episode 22
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Circuit Paul Ricard, Le Castellet, France
programme.desc: The European Le Mans Series, a series open to Le Mans Prototypes and grand tourer-style racing cars, is back with another action-filled season. This year's calendar features six 4-hour races around Europe including the return of the 4 Hours of Imola.

programme.title: MXGP of Switzerland, Frauenfeld
programme.desc: Lap after lap of international motorsports action. This is coverage from the FIM (Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme) Motocross World Championship where riders from all over the globe compete in high-octane, fast-paced motocross racing. Competitors battle it out in races lasting 35 minutes plus 2 laps per race.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Israel, Jerusalem, Pais Arena
programme.desc: FIM SuperEnduro World Championship has been held since 2007. Its circuits are built inside stadiums or arenas, recreating obstacles such as rocks, boulders and logs. The championship consists of eight Grands Prix spread around the globe on courses that are mostly off-road. These events are split into two days and two different races, after which the points towards the world championship are awarded. Each round includes a motocross test and an extreme test, in addition to the enduro test.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Spain, Pamplona
programme.desc: FIM X-Trial World Championship is the most prestigious indoor motorcycle trials tournament of the world, organised by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme. The programme presents the highlights of the rounds where the participants have to take on the challenging tracks full of steep climbs and huge rocks.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Hockenheimring, Germany
programme.desc: League of super sports cars.

programme.title: GP Croatia, Automotodrom Grobnik
programme.desc: NASCAR, America's most popular racing series, is now well established in Europe and there is no better proof than its European division: the NASCAR Whelen Euro Series. This year, 17 teams from nine different countries with a total of 39 cars prove once again that the NWES with its pure racing character is one of the best touring car series on the old continent. Motorvision.TV shows highlights from every race weekend.

programme.title: Goodwood Members Meeting
programme.desc: Goodwood is a british motor racing event where fans get to witness modern and historic racecars in action.

programme.title: Southern Races Part 2
programme.desc: King of the Roads.

programme.title: Asian Le Mans Series
programme.desc: Asian sports car racing endurance series created by the Automobile Club de l'Ouest and based in Asia aims to attract teams and drivers from Asian countries. The Asian Le Mans Series is the symbol of the Spirit of Le Mans, and holds the same passion for creating world class endurance racing.

programme.title: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya, Spain
programme.desc: European Le Mans Series believes in the team spirit during long distance performance. The duty of the ELMS is to offer its competitors a full season to race their cars on some of the best tracks in Europe, while keeping tight control of the costs associated with running in a top European wide series. The champions are offered a place on the grid of the 24 Heures du Mans, which gives an extra, important dimension to the title race across the three categories.

programme.title: Autodromo Nazionale
programme.desc: See all the action and best parts from the GT World Challenge Europe, a sports car racing series divided into two separate championships - the GT World Challenge Europe Sprint Cup, and the GT World Challenge Europe Endurance Cup.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The IMSA WeatherTech SportsCar Championhip is an endurance racing championship in North America where up to five different classes compete in eleven events.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Salto mortale) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Salto mortale»The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman on board of an estate wagon. It's a new task for coordinator and adrenaline junkie Christoph "Domi" Domanski. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fighting choreography in some spectacular driving scenes. Adrenaline-pumped stunts with lots of crashing are guaranteed!

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: BMW M3 and Mercedes C63 AMG. The top models battle it out forever. While the C63 has better performance values on paper, the M3 has always been delivering the better performance. It's a never ending back and forth. But they are not alone in their battle for the crown. An exotic creature from Japan lies in wait: the Lexus RC-F. It's eight cylinders and 477 hp push the Japanese extrovert over asphalt. It's top speed: 270 km/h. Is he a threat to its German competitors?

programme.title: Classic Ride S3
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 is a rare classic. Its special attraction is that you drive motorboat on the road. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it's ready to be used on the water as well. Thus careful maintenance and continuous checks are a must. If something leaks, the Amphicar will sink like a stone. Classic Ride meets Richard Orthuber who owns an Amphicar 770.

programme.title: Episode 23
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Circuit Paul Ricard, Le Castellet, France
programme.desc: The European Le Mans Series, a series open to Le Mans Prototypes and grand tourer-style racing cars, is back with another action-filled season. This year's calendar features six 4-hour races around Europe including the return of the 4 Hours of Imola.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bike World revolves around the speedway and the racers swishing by on their two wheelers. Find out the latest news and reports regarding two-wheel competitions in the world of speed. This is the content to enjoy for all motorcycle enthusiasts across the world. Explore the best motorbikes, top locations, and iconic racers who have a lot of fun doing it.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Exciting sports show that follows the hottest action from the world's most unique motor sport events. Viewers will have a chance to visit some interesting competitions- from IDEMITSU 600 Super Endurance at the Chang Interna-tional Circuit in Thailand, the winter edition of the Maroc Challenge in Morocco, to the Hispania Rally, the only European rally to take place in the desert, and many more. Viewers will also find out all the news from the world of motor sports.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S6
programme.desc: What's hot and what's not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: There are details which set super cars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Super cars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of arts.

programme.title: Electric Pickups
programme.desc: Pickups are the epitome of the american way of drive! High displacement V8 engines combined with plenty of space. Seldom seen in Europe, they are the cashcows of many automakers in the US market. In the future traditional manufacturers will hardly be able to avoid an electric versoin of their trucks. And the competition is getting bigger and bigger. Ever since Elon Musk presented the Tesla Cybertruck bothe the established brands and new startups had been on the advance to conquer the market with vehicles that have the equivalent of over 1000 hp. Ford F-150 Ligtning, Bollinger B2 or Hummer EV - Go Green shows what we can expect in the next few years.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: With its Model S, American carmaker Tesla wants to establish electric engines in the full size class. For the very first time it is possible to attain driving ranges over 400 kilometers. Its tremendous acceleration becomes an image boost for the brand. Porsche stands for lots of speed and horsepower, too. With its Panamera Sport Turismo, the sports car manufacturer taps into a new market.

programme.title: Red Gold Dream
programme.desc: This years motto of the Conti Tuning Day is 'power sedans' and Tuning host Lucy examines the bolides carefully. Plus: The McLaren SLR is the masterpiece of Mercedes, a super sports car among all sports cars. Only 3.500 units have been produced. Tunings showcases the most expensive SLR in the world, which outshines all other SLR models.

programme.title: Go Green! S3
programme.desc: Neither e-cars nor hydrogen compulsion can guarantee clean mobility on their own. Sustainable mobility only works if there is more than just replacing one drive concept with another one. The key to the mobility of the future is connectivity. A positive side effect is that cities can be freed from long lines of parking cars. Part 3 of Sustainable Mobility shows how that can work.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S2
programme.desc: The Porsche 911. Modern design, advanced technology, everything is new but still: For 50 years, still unmistakable. And we also test the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with diesel engine: the Volvo V60!

programme.title: Top Ten Show S1
programme.desc: Today we'll be taking a look at some extreme cars from around the world: Supercars! We're going to be showing you the top ten most beautiful supercars of recent times.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.
